job_desc: To manage the operations of regional offices in south India. Candidates with B-Tech/BE or MBA in Marketing similar products with 5 to 10 years experience preferred. Should be able to achieve given targets.

To manage the operations of regional offices in south India. Candidates with B-Tech/BE or MBA in Marketing similar products with 5 to 10 years experience preferred. Should be able to achieve given targets.

For installation and maintenance of Servo Stabilizers, UPS Systems, Home UPS systems, Solar Power Generators etc. ITI/Diploma/Degree holders with experience and willingness to travel extensively preferred. Own two wheeler is a must.
Any degree with computer knowledge and communication skills preferred. Responsibilities include handling of written and oral communications, managing enquiries, processing orders etc.

Responsibilities include managing of accounts department, filing and maintaining of statutory documents like GST, ESI, PF., etc. Commerce graduate with leadership qualities, good computer knowledge and Tally experience preferred.
